text: Roman Dragoun (born 8 April 1956) is a Czech singer, songwriter and keyboardist. He is a member of the band Progres 2. He was a member between 1980 and 1983, and has rejoined the band since 2007. He was also member of Stromboli, T4 and Futurum. He was a session musician for a number of other musicians and he was singer for musical theatre. In 2012, Dragoun was inducted into Beatová síň slávy (the Beat Hall of Fame). He is the son of painter František Roman Dragoun. ==References== ==Other websites== * Oficial website * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Czech musicians Category:Keyboardists Category:Czech singers
title: Roman Dragoun
